name: Confederación Española de las Industrias de las Materias Primas Minerales
legal: Confederación empresarial sin ánimo de lucro
memberOrga:
Confederación Española de Industrias Extractivas de Rocas y Minerales Industriales – COMINROC
Confederación Nacional de Empresarios de la Minería y de la Metalurgia – CONFEDEM
goal: Represent and defend the legal interest of member companies from the Spanish extractive and raw materials sector
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Transport
